titleStmt.title: A dayly exercyse and experyence of dethe, gathered and set forth, by a brother of Syon Rycharde Whytforde
Dayle exercice and experience of dethe.
titleStmt.author: Whitford, Richard, fl. 1495-1555?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Joh[a]n waylande, at London within temple barre. At the sygne of the blew garlande, frome the temple gate not farre,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: A dayly exercice and experience of dethe.
Slight print show-through; H10v, final leaf, stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
